Based on your preferences, I would recommend "Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade" (1989) to you.

"Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade" is a high-action adventure film directed by George Lucas, who also stars in the film as Indiana Jones.

The movie follows Indiana Jones as he travels to Jerusalem in 1099 to find a lost treasure that is believed to contain the Holy Grail.

 Along his journey, Indiana Jones encounters many obstacles and enemies, including the Fatimah, who controls the Fatima Gate, and Saladin, who is the ruler of Syria. Throughout his journey, Indiana Jones uses his various skills and weapons, including his iconic whip " Indy" , a short sword " Lando" , and a revolver " Rembrandt" . In addition to his various skills and weapons, Indiana Jones also relies on his companions, including Dr. Henry " Doc" Jones, who is the medical consultant for Indiana Jones, and Mutt, a small but fierce dog that accompanies Indiana Jones on his adventures.
